EmailTemplate.name: Rescheduling/Demo Ghosted - Day 9
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Luxury Presence demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Are you still available to chat about how Luxury Presence can help you stand out in a competitive real estate market?
Our award-winning website designs and expert marketing solutions have already helped agents like Carlin Wright and Rochelle Maize take their businesses to the next level.
Use this link to schedule a demo at your convenience: [Meeting Link]
Let's chat soon and see how we can help you build a strong personal brand, capture more referrals, and generate more leads.
Best, {!User.Name}
